comments.author: jborean93
comments.body:
The code works today, the trick is creating as `PSCredential` with an empty password as required by a gMSA. To do so just create a new `SecureString` object like so and then use that credential with `Service-Service`.

```powershell
$cred = [PSCredential]::new('DOMAIN\mygMSA$', [Security.SecureString]::new())
Set-Service -Name ServiceName -Credential $cred
```

I can confirm this works perfectly fine on my host with a gMSA installed.
